statements: UPDATE sales_reports SET product_name='Smartphone X', revenue=1500.50, sales_count=100 WHERE report_id=1;
UPDATE sales_reports SET revenue=2000.75, product_name='Laptop Y', sales_count=75 WHERE report_id=2;
UPDATE sales_reports SET sales_count = 100, revenue = 2000.50 WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE sales_reports SET product_name = 'Product XYZ', revenue = revenue + 500.75 WHERE report_id = 3;
UPDATE products SET unit_price = 15.99, in_stock = true, category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE sales SET quantity_sold = 100, total_revenue = 1599.00, sale_date = '2021-09-15' WHERE sale_id = 101;
UPDATE products SET unit_price = 15.99, in_stock = TRUE WHERE product_name = 'Shoes';
UPDATE sales SET total_revenue = total_revenue + 30.55, quantity_sold = quantity_sold + 3 WHERE sale_date = '2022-09-28';
UPDATE products SET price = 25 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE sales SET quantity = 50, amount = 500.75 WHERE sale_id = 3;
UPDATE products SET price = 25.99, product_name = 'New Product Name' WHERE product_id = 123
UPDATE sales SET amount = amount * 1.1 WHERE sale_date = '2022-05-15' AND quantity > 5
UPDATE products SET price = 15.99, category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 201;
UPDATE products SET price = 99.99, category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_id = 123;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone = '+1234567890' WHERE customer_id = 456;
UPDATE products SET stock_quantity = 100, price = 49.99 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE sales SET total_amount = 250.00, quantity_sold = 20 WHERE sale_id = 201;
UPDATE products SET price = 25.99, stock_quantity = 1000 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE sales SET quantity_sold = 50, total_amount = 1500.75 WHERE sale_id = 101;
